speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Sarah calling from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: Hi Sarah, I'm doing well, thanks. What's this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I'm calling regarding your outstanding balance with ABC Finance. Can you please verify your address for me?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that. Can you also confirm your date of birth?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for confirming your identity. You currently have a balance of $500. How would you like to address this today?

speaker: Customer
text: I'd like to set up a payment plan.

speaker: Agent
text: Of course, we can set that up. Would you prefer weekly or monthly payments?

speaker: Customer
text: Monthly payments would work best for me.

speaker: Agent
text: Great! I'll set up a monthly payment plan for you. What day of the month would you like to make your payment?

speaker: Customer
text: The 15th of each month is good for me.

speaker: Agent
text: Perfect. I've noted that down. Thank you for your cooperation today.

speaker: Customer
text: Thank you, Sarah. I appreciate your help.

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome! Have a great day.
